title: Can't Connect to LoLCilent
body: When I go into a game, after champ select, I go into a black screen and it won't load the loading screen, when I come out and go to the reconnect button on the screen it keeps playing the champ select music. I tried repairing and everything but it still doesn't fix in problems. Please help Riot. I want to play league in anyway possible atm. Thanks!

replies.body:
Based on your description, it sounds like your client is having an issue making the connection transition between champ select and loading into the game server. The most common cause is a poor connection to the servers, which our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) provides the most common solutions for.

Let me know if those steps help you out in any way.
